Class ReadWriteDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.dao.ReadWriteDatabase

  • public class ReadWriteDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Public class that represents the data access object (DAO) for the application.

      • findUserAndGetRole

        public java.lang.String findUserAndGetRole(java.lang.String utilisateur,
                                           java.lang.String motDePasse)
        Public method that finds a user in the database with the specified username and password and returns the user's role.
        Parameters:
        utilisateur - The username of the user. It cannot be null or empty, a String object.
        motDePasse - The password of the user. It cannot be null or empty, a String object.
        Returns:
        The user's role if the user is found in the database with the specified username and password, "err" otherwise, a String object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if utilisateur or motDePasse are null or empty.

      • addNewUser

        public static void addNewUser(java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Public static method that adds a new user to the database with the specified username, password, and role.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username of the new user. It cannot be null or empty, a String object.
        password - The password of the new user. It cannot be null or empty, a String object.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error occurs while accessing the database.
